WorkItem.Description:
when running the batch file in command window, received the following error message

'sqlite3' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file.
WorkItem.Summary: trouble installing sqlite version on windows 8

Comments.Message:
You are getting this error because it cannot find sqlite3.exe. Please make sure you have installed sqlite and have sqlite3.exe as part of your path. 
https://www.sqlite.org/download.html
